Category: Mask

Jojoba Esters, Lactobacillus Ferment, Hibiscus Sabdariffa Fruit Extract, Cetyl Alcohol, Diglucosyl Gallic Acid, Xanthan Gum, Alpha Lipoic Acid, Erythritol, Polylysine, Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Fruit Extract, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, 1,2-Hexanediol
